Instructions: 1. Reno V[XX] whse codes. 2. Status 'Released' or 'Picked' > 2 days. 3. ETQ Portal > Module 'eRequests' > 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'. 4. Host: 'AC Prod'.
1. Reno CDR/CDM codes. 2. Status 'Released' or 'Picked' > 2 days. 3. ETQ Portal > 'Sure Ship International - Draft'. 4. Host: 'AC Prod'.
1. Status 'Awaiting Receipt' > 3 days. 2. ETQ Portal > 'Receiving Expedite - Draft'. 3. Fill SO#. 4. Signed By: Use 'N/A' for DHL.
Rationale: Prioritizes inventory entry for delivered stock.

Instructions: 1. CDH facility 'Awaiting Receipt' > 3 days. 2. Open Salesforce Case. 3. Email URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.
1. Sure Ship: ecommerce.dlc.emea@arrow.com. 2. Receiving: business.support.pdc.emea@arrow.com.
Email verical-logistics@verical.com. CC amunoz@arrow.com/jawells@arrow.com. Template: Provide MFG CoC for WEB-SO: [SO#].
1. DID 'Ready to Release' > 24hrs or 'Picked' > 7 days. 2. My Connect ticket 'Warehouse IT Support – WMS'. 3. Provide DID, Whse, and Status.
1. Qty changed but price tiers failed to update. 2. My Connect ticket 'Digital Issue'. 3. Category: 'Pricing/Resale Discrepancy'.
Rationale: Forces a refresh of the pricing engine logic.

Instructions: 1. Email delink_and_rematch_invoices@arrow.com. 2. Template: 'Requesting delink for WEB-xxxx'. 3. Wait for confirmation before amending in Unity.
Rationale: Allows amendment of orders in 'Billed' status.

Instructions: 1. Check Navision mailbox (Outlook). 2. Find Carrier/Account in confirmation PDF. 3. Unity > Line Details > Shipping. 4. Enter details.
1. Whse V90. Filter 'Not released to warehouse'. 2. Click '+' on parent line to check all component statuses and SSD.
1. Identify Hazmat status. 2. Verify Ship Method compatibility. 3. Ensure 'Ground' for domestic chemicals/batteries.
Rationale: Ensures compliance with dangerous goods laws.

Instructions: 1. Inform supplier. 2. Amend Unity quantity. 3. Process customer refund.
1. Inform supplier. 2. Create stand-alone PO. 3. Request RMA.
1. Cancel line. 2. Refund customer. 3. Request RMA from supplier.

Search core account with same Ship To address & 'Cos N'. Verify credit limit/digital account. If no email response, check for ISR; if none, cancel order.
Leave note and wait 24H. If unresolved, send canned email requesting PN, Description, and Manufacturer. Contact: dinesh.babu@arrow.com.
Wait 24-48H for review. If status persists, open MyConnect Trade Compliance ticket. Reviewed by Trade Compliance team.
Send immediately to Finance/assigned Collector. Send reminder at 1 week; cancel at 2 weeks if no reply.
Check BND cost vs Resale price. Edit resale price to match cost, or delete alert if already equal. Must be done first thing in AM.
Use canned text OOSRDC for cancellation. Differentiate logic between Arrow and Verical orders.
EU: Wait 24H before checking validity. UK: Check validity immediately.
Orders from Reno warehouses can be canceled without issues.
1. Verify PO creation. 2. Confirm if stock sent. 3. Request supplier cancellation. 4. Wait for confirmation. 5. Cancel in AC SWB.
If DID exists: Request via email. If no DID: Cancel in EMEA/APAC SWB, then AC SWB, and refund.

Instructions: Rule: We cannot change emails on existing accounts. Customer must create a new account with the new email; after first order, they can be linked.
Rule: System cannot update to a CC on an existing order. Customer must place a new order with CC; then OMT cancels the old order to save stock.
Offices: Stockholm (Kv Kolding 3, Kronborgsgränd 7) and Gothenburg (Datavagen 14A). Note: New web customers must establish an Arrow Line of Credit locally.
Request 'Scrap Move' for cancelled orders where customer cannot provide End User Certificate (EUC).
Template: 'Order is in Entered status and needs Cost in order to be booked'. Provide: Acc#, SO, Part Num, Qty.
Rationale: Allows booking of orders stuck in 'Entered'.

Instructions: Forward to: vericalcia@arrow.com, wireremit@arrow.com. Include: Order WEB-SO, Customer Name, Acc#, Amount. Always CC Collector.
Quick Text: 'I received an alert Line 3.1 on the order saying we haven't received full quantity ordered. Check and advise.'
Text: 'Order has been cancelled due to lack of follow-up on our pending request. Reach out if you wish to proceed.'
Text: 'Please proceed with the available quantity.'
Text: 'Document sent to Trade Compliance for review. Will update once feedback is received.'
Rationale: Standard status update for trade holds.

Instructions: Text: 'Order will be cancelled within 24 hours if we do not receive a response from your side.'
Template: Request urgent RMA for POXXXX because customer cannot provide EUC. Parts are at CDXXX warehouse.
Required: TT copy of payment, Banking Info Form, manager approval, SWB cancellation screenshot, Stock-out form.
Use Arrow/Verical official document if manufacturer CofC cannot be shared due to non-disclosure policy.
Complete for 'Export: End User Certificate not on file'. Forward to: duediligence.americas@arrow.com.
Instructions
1. Send 'PARTIALS' canned email (statement, not asking). 2. Cancel remaining line in EMEA Prod. 3. Check/Cancel split lines in AC Prod. 4. Process Refund if CC/PayPal.
1. Check availability (if FOH=0, stock is gone). 2. Use 'Delete' (first option on line) instead of 'Cancel'. 3. Delete header after lines disappear. 4. Cancel line/refund in ACPROD.
Rationale: Cleans up unbooked orders that cannot be fulfilled.

Instructions: 1. Copy Delivery ID from alert. 2. Search SF for reason (usually SPQ/Full Pack issue). 3. If CC payment on Dropship, DO NOT increase qty (system issue). 4. Ask customer to decrease qty or advise.

1. If Jean-Louis Tarin/Asset rejects cancellation of stockout: Resend request. 2. Message via Teams with SO#. 3. Explain: 'We are Digital, we only sell what is in stock. If listing was wrong, we cannot force customer to wait/take partial'.
If cancellation tab shows 'Inactive' (initiated by others, e.g., Georgina): Do not interfere. Message the initiator on Teams to report the rejection so they can follow up.
1. Search Delivery ID in SF. 2. Search EMEA SO in SF. 3. Check for warehouse messages regarding full packs/SPQ.
Rationale: Identifies the root cause of warehouse holds.

Instructions: If Package = Reel/Tape/Cut Strip: 1. Check if SO/Delivery is 'Closed' (if yes, close SF case with 'PO Modification'). 2. If not closed, wait 24H (warehouse usually auto-processes). 3. If still open after 24H, ask customer for split approval.
If Package = Tube/Pack/Box: Reply to case: 'Please proceed with shipping the quantities as split.' Then close SF case with 'Order/PO Modification'.
Rationale: Standardized handling for discrete quantity parts.

Instructions: Text: 'It is a vendor part and has now arrived at our warehouse. The team is working on receiving; once processed, shipment will proceed.'
Used when line 1.1 is already CLOSED/SHIPPED. Tells customer we are shipping what we found and cancelling the rest.
Used when order is still OPEN. Asks customer for permission to ship what is available or cancel.
